text: The Sea Shepherd Conservation Society (SSCS) is an American organization that works to protect marine life. It was founded in 1977 by activist Paul Watson, a former member of Greenpeace. One of the things they heavily campaign against is whaling. == Gallery == File:Seashepherd small pt.jpg|Sea Shepherds flagg. File:MV Steve Irwin Melbourne.jpg|M/Y Steve Irwin in Melbourne. File:Paul Watson portrait.jpg|Paul Watson. == Other websites == * Sea Shepherd Conservation Society website Category:Environmental organizations based in the United States Category:Organizations in Washington, D.C.
title: Sea Shepherd Conservation Society
